name: 2024 Asia Conference on Trends in Image Processing
content: PUBLICATION: Journal of Image and Graphics (ISSN: 2301-3699 (Print); 2972-3973 (Online)) Submissions will be reviewed by both the conference committees and JOIG editorial board, and accepted papers of ATIP2024 will be published into the Journal of Image and Graphics as a special issue, which will be indexed by Scopus (Since 2021), Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.（More information about JOIG, please visit http://www.joig.org/）
